medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. ___ has had two prior episodes of epigastric and RUQ pain - one approximately one month ago and another two days ago. On both occasions, he presented to the ED and was prescribed omeprazole and ranitidine. The pain resolved on its own. The day prior to presentation, he experienced severe epigastric pain that is unrelated to meals. He denies nausea/vomiting, diarrhea, or constipation.
